## addToList() function

Add an item to a list that is stored inside some map. This method is used internally.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function addToList<T>(map: Map<string, Array<T>>, key: string, value: any, insertAtStart?: boolean): Array<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  map | Map&lt;string, Array&lt;T&gt;&gt; | A map of &lt;<!-- -->string, Array<!-- -->&gt; entries. |
|  key | string | The ID of the list to search for in the map |
|  value | any | The value to add to the list, if found |
|  insertAtStart | boolean | If true, inserts the new item at the head of the list. Defaults to false. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;any&gt;
